arts.ttl: Derby County 0-1 Sheffield United: Brereton Diaz Back With A Bang
arts.sum: Sheffield United brushed past the challenge of Derby County at Pride Park, albeit by an unconvincing 1-0 win. The only goal of the game came in the 49th minute when two recent recruits, Tom Cannon and Ben Brereton Diaz, combined early in the second half to keep the Blades on the tail of table toppers […] The post Derby County 0-1 Sheffield United: Brereton Diaz Back With A Bang appeared first on Sheff United Way.

arts.ttl: Paul Warne responds to Derby County chants in defeat to Sheffield United as pressure mounts
arts.sum: Join our Derby County WhatsApp group to get the latest Rams headlines sent straight to your phone. Warne was subjected to chants about his football from a section of the fanbase during the second half of Derby's 1-0 defeat to Sheffield United at the end of which there were boos at the final whistle.

arts.ttl: Derby County player ratings v Sheffield United as low scores across the board as Rams lose again - Leigh Curtis
arts.sum: At the other end, Lars-Jorgen Salvesen saw a tame header saved by Michael Cooper but that was about as good as it got for Derby in a game that was mired in midfield skirmishes. Ebou Adams: Had a glorious chance to slide Kayden Jackson in the first half but just overcooked the pass that seemed such a good chance for Derby.

arts.ttl: Ben Brereton Diaz effort enough as high-flying Sheffield United beat lowly Derby
arts.sum: Victory keeps the Blades on the heels of leaders Leeds and leaves Derby in deep trouble at the other end of the Championship table.

arts.ttl: Exclusive: Derby County to seal third January transfer as details of deal revealed
arts.sum: Join our Derby County WhatsApp group to get the latest Rams headlines sent straight to your phone. Derby County are expected to confirm the signing of Norwegian international and Viking FK defender Sondre Langas after the centre-back completed his medical earlier today.

arts.ttl: Paul Warne makes three changes as he names Derby County team to face Sheffield United
arts.sum: Derby: Forsyth, Clarke, Nyambe, Jackson, Goudmijn, Ozoh, Adams, Osborn; Salvesen, Yates In midfield are Ozoh, Ebou Adams and Kenzo Goudmijn with Ben Osborn and Kayden Jackson also expected to feature across the middle of the park.

arts.ttl: Derby County transfer latest as Rams close in on deal as £3.7m claim made
arts.sum: Derby County are hopeful of adding to their squad ahead of the transfer window closing on Monday. Join our Derby County WhatsApp group to get the latest Rams headlines sent straight to your phone.

arts.ttl: 2 sources claim player ‘about to be sold’ to Derby County – Medical tests pending before finalising transfer
arts.sum: Derby County are edging closer to completing the signing of Viking FK’s Sondre Langås in the winter market. That’s according to Aftenblad, who state the Norwegian club are ‘about to sell’ the 23-year-old to Derby County. Their title says Paul Warne’s side will pay a fee over NOK 50m [€4.26m] to Viking for the centre-back. The post 2 sources claim player ‘about to be sold’ to Derby County – Medical tests pending before finalising transfer appeared first on Sport Witness.

arts.ttl: Sheffield United Boss Chris Wilder on Visit to Pride Park: “We Have to Earn the Right to Play”
arts.sum: Sheffield United will travel to Pride Park this Saturday afternoon, hoping to take advantage of a depleted Derby County side. After suffering a shocking 3-0 defeat to Hull City, Chris Wilder’s men will be eager to return to winning ways against a Rams team in the midst of a severe slump.
